summary: I honestly can’t handle tumblr. I genuinely think I’m just going to have to not use it anymore because I just can’t take the...
body:
I honestly can’t handle tumblr. I genuinely think I’m just going to have to not use it anymore because I just can’t take the immediate backlash I get for saying anything, and how many people are hating on, teasing, and attacking Dan and Phil for wanting to start a new era. It literally makes my heart hurt, I get LITERAL CHEST PAINS every time I see someone talking about “lack of communication” or Phil’s videos “being forced” and all that. Is it bad for them to have a personal life? Did they NOT give us a year long tour all about GIVING US WHAT WE WANT? I honestly hate it all. And people saying the Dan and Phil branding is dead? Why are you so set on saying literally everything is dying when both Dan and Phil have mentioned NUMEROUS times that there are new things coming??? “Now onto the future”? “Try new things”? WHY IS EVERYONE EXPECTING IT ALL TO COME RIGHT AWAY? Be patient! It can take a long time to plan new content and ideas, so let it be. Just look forward to it PLEASE. Let Dan have privacy. Don’t harass Phil with questions he doesn’t want to answer. Enjoy Phil’s content he is giving us. LET THEM LIVE. Okay? I was going to make a whole positivity post on how people shouldn’t lose hope in Dan and Phil, but it’s clear that this platform is 99% “I don’t care” or “f you”. So I know if I even tried people would just pull up their reasons why people SHOULD lose hope. To anyone who still cares, Dan and Phil aren’t dead. They’re starting a new era and that should be LOOKED FORWARD TO, not ignored or frowned upon. Dan and Phil haven’t freaking left us. If you really think they don’t care for their audience, I have no idea how your brain works. Dan and Phil are some of the nicest people on YouTube. They really care about our feelings and happiness. If you’re saying otherwise, please stop spreading lies for attention, and calling it “tea”. It’s just straight up hate and I’m not going to tolerate it any longer. I’ve tried so hard to be a positive profile on here, but whenever I try to be positive I’m attacked. So I’m sorry. I’m done with Tumblr, until these certain people in the Phandom will realise that Dan and Phil deserve love because they love us. And when people will find some respect in their hearts.

Goodbye…

blog.name: glitter-intheair
blog.title: way out of sync from the beginnin'
blog.description: alex [she/her] since 1990, italian, bi, infj, capricorn

summary: I just really hate the vagueness. It has been months of silence, with the phandom seeing things disappear in front of their eyes...
body: I just really hate the vagueness. It has been months of silence, with the phandom seeing things disappear in front of their eyes with little to none explanation. We keep finding out things via third parties, people are tired and frustrated and that is not right. I don’t really give a shit if they don’t owe us anything because guess what? If you tell me that nothing is changing and then everything changes - and not for the better - then I deserve to know why. I don’t care if they have big projects going on, I don’t care if they’re moving. All I care about is my (and many people’s) questions to be at least acknowledged for once. It has been 5 months. Enough with the mystery, I want transparency.

Enough with the mystery, I want transparency.

If you tell me that nothing is changing and then everything changes - and not for the better - then I deserve to know why. I don’t care if they have big projects going on, I don’t care if they’re moving. All I care about is my (and many people’s) questions to be at least acknowledged for once. It has been 5 months. Enough with the mystery, I want transparency.

If you tell me that nothing is changing and then everything changes - and not for the better - then I deserve to know why. I don’t care if they have big projects going on, I don’t care if they’re moving. All I care about is my (and many people’s) questions to be at least acknowledged for once. It has been 5 months. Enough with the mystery, I want transparency.

summary: the phandom: already in a withdrawal from dnp content and having no fucking clue what is happening or is going to happen with...
body:
the phandom: already in a withdrawal from dnp content and having no fucking clue what is happening or is going to happen with their youtuber/social media careers

dnp: hey so here’s another one of our long-term projects we’re going to randomly shut down to “try some new things in the future” even though we won’t tell you what they are or if there even are any new things to look forward to in the future :) ok bye :)

summary:
Rest in peace, the 7 Second Challenge.
Thank you for all the good times and thank you @danielhowell and @amazingphil for...
body:
Rest in peace, the 7 Second Challenge.

Thank you for all the good times and thank you @danielhowell and @amazingphil for creating the game and giving me a new way to throughly embarrass my friends in public. It will fondly be kept safe on my phone forever 🤭 💕
